trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting ATA using the ATA logs | Microsoft ATA
trans-unit.target: Troubleshooting ATA using the ATA logs | Microsoft ATA

trans-unit.source: Describes how you can use the ATA logs to troubleshoot issues
trans-unit.target: Describes how you can use the ATA logs to troubleshoot issues

trans-unit.source: Applies to: Advanced Threat Analytics version 1.7
trans-unit.target: Applies to: Advanced Threat Analytics version 1.7

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting ATA using the ATA logs
trans-unit.target: Troubleshooting ATA using the ATA logs

trans-unit.source: The ATA logs provide insight into what each component of ATA is doing at any given point in time.
trans-unit.target: The ATA logs provide insight into what each component of ATA is doing at any given point in time.

trans-unit.source: ATA Gateway logs
trans-unit.target: ATA Gateway logs

trans-unit.source: In this section, every reference to the ATA Gateway is relevant also for the ATA Lightweight Gateway.
trans-unit.target: In this section, every reference to the ATA Gateway is relevant also for the ATA Lightweight Gateway.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Gateway logs are located in a subfolder called **Logs** where ATA is installed; the default location is: .
trans-unit.target: The ATA Gateway logs are located in a subfolder called **Logs** where ATA is installed; the default location is: .

trans-unit.source: In the default installation location, it can be found at: **C:\Program Files\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Gateway\Logs**.
trans-unit.target: In the default installation location, it can be found at: **C:\Program Files\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Gateway\Logs**.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Gateway has the following logs:
trans-unit.target: The ATA Gateway has the following logs:

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft.Tri.Gateway.log** – This log contains everything that happens in the ATA Gateway (including resolution and errors).
trans-unit.target: **Microsoft.Tri.Gateway.log** – This log contains everything that happens in the ATA Gateway (including resolution and errors).

trans-unit.source: Its main use is getting the overall status of all operations in the chronological order in which they occurred.
trans-unit.target: Its main use is getting the overall status of all operations in the chronological order in which they occurred.

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft.Tri.Gateway-Resolution.log** – This log contains the resolution details of the entities seen in traffic by the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: **Microsoft.Tri.Gateway-Resolution.log** – This log contains the resolution details of the entities seen in traffic by the ATA Gateway.

trans-unit.source: Its main use is investigating resolution issues of entities.
trans-unit.target: Its main use is investigating resolution issues of entities.

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft.Tri.Gateway-Errors.log** – This log contains just the errors that are caught by the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: **Microsoft.Tri.Gateway-Errors.log** – This log contains just the errors that are caught by the ATA Gateway.

trans-unit.source: Its main use is performing health checks and investigating issues that need to be correlated to specific times.
trans-unit.target: Its main use is performing health checks and investigating issues that need to be correlated to specific times.

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft.Tri.Gateway-ExceptionStatistics.log** – This log groups all similar errors and exceptions, and measures their count.
trans-unit.target: **Microsoft.Tri.Gateway-ExceptionStatistics.log** – This log groups all similar errors and exceptions, and measures their count.

trans-unit.source: This file starts out empty each time the ATA Gateway service starts and is updated every minute.Its main use is understanding if there are any new errors or issues with the ATA Gateway (because the errors are grouped it is easier to read and quickly understand if there are any new issues).
trans-unit.target: This file starts out empty each time the ATA Gateway service starts and is updated every minute.Its main use is understanding if there are any new errors or issues with the ATA Gateway (because the errors are grouped it is easier to read and quickly understand if there are any new issues).

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft.Tri.Gateway.Updater.log** - This log is used for the gateway updater process, which is responsible for updating the gateway if configured to do so automatically.
trans-unit.target: **Microsoft.Tri.Gateway.Updater.log** - This log is used for the gateway updater process, which is responsible for updating the gateway if configured to do so automatically.

trans-unit.source: For the ATA Lightweight Gateway, the gateway updater process is also responsible for the resource limitations of the ATA Lightweight Gateway.
trans-unit.target: For the ATA Lightweight Gateway, the gateway updater process is also responsible for the resource limitations of the ATA Lightweight Gateway.

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft.Tri.Gateway.Updater-ExceptionStatistics.log** - This log groups all similar errors and exceptions together, and measures their count.
trans-unit.target: **Microsoft.Tri.Gateway.Updater-ExceptionStatistics.log** - This log groups all similar errors and exceptions together, and measures their count.

trans-unit.source: This file starts out empty each time the ATA Updater service starts and is updated every minute.
trans-unit.target: This file starts out empty each time the ATA Updater service starts and is updated every minute.

trans-unit.source: It enables you to understand if there are any new errors or issues with the ATA Updater.
trans-unit.target: It enables you to understand if there are any new errors or issues with the ATA Updater.

trans-unit.source: The errors are grouped to make it easier to quickly understand if any new errors or issues are detected.
trans-unit.target: The errors are grouped to make it easier to quickly understand if any new errors or issues are detected.

trans-unit.source: The first three log files have a maximum size of up to 50 MB.
trans-unit.target: The first three log files have a maximum size of up to 50 MB.

trans-unit.source: When that size is reached, a new log file is opened and the previous one is renamed to "<original file name>-Archived-00000" where the number increments each time it is renamed.
trans-unit.target: When that size is reached, a new log file is opened and the previous one is renamed to "<original file name>-Archived-00000" where the number increments each time it is renamed.

trans-unit.source: By default, if more than 10 files from the same type already exist, the oldest are deleted.
trans-unit.target: By default, if more than 10 files from the same type already exist, the oldest are deleted.

trans-unit.source: ATA Center logs
trans-unit.target: ATA Center logs

trans-unit.source: The ATA Center logs are located in a subfolder called **Logs**.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Center logs are located in a subfolder called **Logs**.

trans-unit.source: In the default installation location, it can be found at: **C:\Program Files\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center\Logs**".
trans-unit.target: In the default installation location, it can be found at: **C:\Program Files\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center\Logs**".

trans-unit.source: The ATA console logs that were formerly under IIS logs are now located under ATA Center logs.
trans-unit.target: The ATA console logs that were formerly under IIS logs are now located under ATA Center logs.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Center has the following logs:
trans-unit.target: The ATA Center has the following logs:

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft.Tri.Center.log** – This log contains everything that happens in the ATA Center, including detections and errors.
trans-unit.target: **Microsoft.Tri.Center.log** – This log contains everything that happens in the ATA Center, including detections and errors.

trans-unit.source: Its main use is getting the overall status of all operations in the chronological order in which they occurred.
trans-unit.target: Its main use is getting the overall status of all operations in the chronological order in which they occurred.

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft.Tri.Center-Detection.log** – This log contains just the detection details of the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: **Microsoft.Tri.Center-Detection.log** – This log contains just the detection details of the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: Its main use is investigating detection issues.
trans-unit.target: Its main use is investigating detection issues.

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft.Tri.Center-Errors.log** – This log contains just the errors that are caught by the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: **Microsoft.Tri.Center-Errors.log** – This log contains just the errors that are caught by the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: Its main use is performing health checks and investigating issues that need to be correlated to specific times.
trans-unit.target: Its main use is performing health checks and investigating issues that need to be correlated to specific times.

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft.Tri.Center-ExceptionStatistics.log** – This log groups all similar errors and exceptions, and measures their count.
trans-unit.target: **Microsoft.Tri.Center-ExceptionStatistics.log** – This log groups all similar errors and exceptions, and measures their count.

trans-unit.source: This file starts out empty each time the ATA Center service starts and is updated every minute.
trans-unit.target: This file starts out empty each time the ATA Center service starts and is updated every minute.

trans-unit.source: Its main use is understanding if there are any new errors or issues with the ATA Center - because the errors are grouped it is easier to quickly understand if there is a new errors or issues.
trans-unit.target: Its main use is understanding if there are any new errors or issues with the ATA Center - because the errors are grouped it is easier to quickly understand if there is a new errors or issues.

trans-unit.source: The first three log files have a maximum size of up to 50 MB.
trans-unit.target: The first three log files have a maximum size of up to 50 MB.

trans-unit.source: When that size is reached, a new log file is opened and the previous one is renamed to "<original file name>-Archived-00000" where the number increments each time it is renamed.
trans-unit.target: When that size is reached, a new log file is opened and the previous one is renamed to "<original file name>-Archived-00000" where the number increments each time it is renamed.

trans-unit.source: By default, if more than 10 files from the same type already exist, the oldest are deleted.
trans-unit.target: By default, if more than 10 files from the same type already exist, the oldest are deleted.

trans-unit.source: ATA Deployment logs
trans-unit.target: ATA Deployment logs

trans-unit.source: The ATA deployment logs are located in the temp directory for the user who installed the product.
trans-unit.target: The ATA deployment logs are located in the temp directory for the user who installed the product.

trans-unit.source: In the default installation location, it can be found at: **C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Local\Temp** (or one directory above %temp%).
trans-unit.target: In the default installation location, it can be found at: **C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Local\Temp** (or one directory above %temp%).

trans-unit.source: ATA Center deployment logs:
trans-unit.target: ATA Center deployment logs:

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Center_20150601104213.log** - This log lists the steps in the process of the deployment of the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: **Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Center_20150601104213.log** - This log lists the steps in the process of the deployment of the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: Its main use is tracking the ATA Center deployment process.
trans-unit.target: Its main use is tracking the ATA Center deployment process.

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Center_20150601104213_0_MongoDBPackage.log** - This log lists the steps in the process of MongoDB deployment on the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: **Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Center_20150601104213_0_MongoDBPackage.log** - This log lists the steps in the process of MongoDB deployment on the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: Its main use is tracking the MongoDB deployment process.
trans-unit.target: Its main use is tracking the MongoDB deployment process.

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Center_20150601104213_1_MsiPackage.log** - This log file lists the steps in the process of the deployment of the ATA Center binaries.
trans-unit.target: **Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Center_20150601104213_1_MsiPackage.log** - This log file lists the steps in the process of the deployment of the ATA Center binaries.

trans-unit.source: Its main use is tracking the deployment of the ATA Center binaries.
trans-unit.target: Its main use is tracking the deployment of the ATA Center binaries.

trans-unit.source: ATA Gateway and ATA Lightweight Gateway deployment logs:
trans-unit.target: ATA Gateway and ATA Lightweight Gateway deployment logs:

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Gateway_20151214014801.log** - This log lists the steps in the process of the deployment of the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: **Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Gateway_20151214014801.log** - This log lists the steps in the process of the deployment of the ATA Gateway.

trans-unit.source: Its main use is tracking the ATA Gateway deployment process.
trans-unit.target: Its main use is tracking the ATA Gateway deployment process.

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Gateway_20151214014801_001_MsiPackage.log** - This log file lists the steps in the process of the deployment of the ATA Gateway binaries.
trans-unit.target: **Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Gateway_20151214014801_001_MsiPackage.log** - This log file lists the steps in the process of the deployment of the ATA Gateway binaries.

trans-unit.source: Its main use is tracking the deployment of the ATA Gateway binaries.
trans-unit.target: Its main use is tracking the deployment of the ATA Gateway binaries.
